WorkItem.Description:
I installed the latest version of GreatMaps Windows mobile application on my Samsung Omina Pro B7610 Windows mobile. At start (zoom = 0) the image is displayed quickly. But as I increase the zoom level the application slows down and after certain zoom level = 5, the application does not display any image and crashes after some time giving some error related to "device.exe". Then i have to reset my device otherwise nothing works.

When I run the same application on emulator, it works perfectly and there is no speed/performance issues.

Its a great control but some how it is not working on the device. Can any body please help me out in this situation.

Note: The performance issue is not with any specific map but is with all the maps.

Hope to hear from some one soon.

Thanks in advance

Comments.Message: did you tried to debug and detect what exactly cause the crash?
